data.title: Ocean's Eleven Locations
data.meta_description: Ocean's Eleven locations list with spot information and geo coordinates. View the locations of Ocean's Eleven on map.
data.text:
Ocean's Eleven is an American crime thriller comedy film directed by Steven Soderbergh, written by Ted Griffin, from the story by George C. Johnson and Jack Golden Russell. Starring George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Andy Garcia, Matt Damon, Bernie Mac, Mark Gantt, Tim Perez, Elliott Gould, Casey Affleck, and Scott Caan, the film is the first installment of the Ocean's franchise. It was released on December 7, 2001, in the United States, earned $450.7 million worldwide. Ocean's Eleven was shot in Las Vegas, Nevada; Chicago, Illinois; and Los Angeles, California, USA. Filming locations included Bellagio Hotel and Casino, East Jersey State Prison, Harold Washington Library-State/Van Buren, The Strip, and the University of California.

Las Vegas Strip, NV, USA. Photo by Flavia Medici on Unsplash.

Where was Ocean's Eleven Filmed?

Ocean's Eleven was filmed in 1707 N. Vine St, 1715 N Cherokee Ave, 495 N Milwaukee Ave, 999 N Patencio, Atlantic City, Bellagio Hotel and Casino, East Jersey State Prison, Harold Washington Library-State/Van Buren, Las Vegas Strip, Lawrence Berkeley National Laboratory, Musso & Frank Grill, Santa Monica, St. Petersburg, Stage 15, Stage 19, Stage 20, The CalEdison, Universal Orlando Resort, Universal Studios Hollywood and University of California Irvine.

The complete list of the locations with latitude and longitude coordinates are listed below in the table.
